TopicTitle: Ability To Sort Craft By Date Designed

Articles.Content:
I would like to be able to sort craft by the date it was created, either in game-date, or out of game-date.

 

I'm working on naming conventions for my craft right now, but it would be nice to have the list from oldest to newest, or newest to oldest designed when loading a craft.Insert image from URL
I think we need to clarify "date first saved" vs. "Date last saved."

If you're not on console and can run mods, the Craft Manager mod can sort on date created and date last updated. It does many other nice things; my favorite is custom #tags for filtering by craft categories.

On 3/19/2020 at 10:07 AM, DeadJohn said:

If you're not on console and can run mods, the Craft Manager mod can sort on date created and date last updated. It does many other nice things; my favorite is custom #tags for filtering by craft categories.

 

Second this. The KerbalX Craft manager is superb.  You can actually create tags and then sort your ships based on those.

On 4/3/2020 at 7:10 PM, Klapaucius said:

Second this. The KerbalX Craft manager is superb.  You can actually create tags and then sort your ships based on those.

Thirded - a really awesome mod
